info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:26PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Warren and central Saratoga Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 125 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Edinburg, or 13 miles northwest of Saratoga Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saratoga Springs, Glens Falls, Corinth, West Glens Falls, Glens Falls North, Lake Luzerne-Hadley, Kings, Mount Pleasant, Wilton, Greenfield, Northumberland, South Glens Falls, Schuylerville, Shaw Corners, Grangerville, Kings Station, Barkersville, Glenwild, Greenfield Center and Wiley Corners. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 15 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for eastern and east central New York.
